tips.tip.catacombs: The Catacombs are dangerous underground mazes in the outer end
tips.tip.crystal_rods: End Rods can be made with Crystal Shards in place of Blaze Rods
tips.tip.end_towers: End Towers are found rarely in the End, and have massive maze-like basements.
tips.tip.purpur_golems: Purpur Golems can be found defending End Cities
tips.tip.tangled_violite: Tangled Violite can be used to grow more Rose, Mint, and Cobalt Crystals.
